title: When does Summer promotion and Summer split start ?
body: I was just wondering when do they start ? I know spring playoffs isn't over yet but still.

replies.body: I also want to know. I am going to california for a trip from may 21 to may 28, is the LCS going to be happening then?

It looks like LCS Summer is set to start May 28th the last day of your trip.

[2015 Schedule](http://2015season.lolesports.com/en/#schedule)
According lol.esportspedia The 25th of this month.

Well into May. Next weekend will be the Split Finals. LPL Playoffs will begin. LCK Playoffs will begin. Promotion Tournament is End of April. MSI is May 7-10, 2015. So probably about End of May early June.
